name: Cozynautica
description:
It’s Summa. She has opened a small dark-ambrosia growing business and is asking for your help! Plant plants, collect and sell to customers using the terminal. Collect the amount of 1000 coins and put it in the piggy bank to complete the game! – Control keys: Movement – WASD or Arrows
Q – Growing Speed Upgrade (Level)
E – Menu of Crops
C – Complete the commission in terminal
Space – Interact with piggy bank (avaiable with 1000 coins in purse)
Left Click – Plant/Gather – Credits: Code – Richard_Blackwidow
Graphics, game-design – PascalOz
Art for menu and preview – lastonka

Soundtrack “Two Moons” by Bobby Richards
Font "Glasstown NBP Font" by total FontGeek DTF, Ltd.Sounds: https://freesound.org/
